text: Hélène Brasseur (born 4 January 2002) is a Belgian field hockey defender. She plays with La Gantoise HC and the Belgium women's national field hockey team. ==Career== ===Club Hockey=== Brasseur plays since 2017 with La Gantoise HC and became national champion with the team in 2021 and 2022. ===Senior National Team=== Brasseur made her internatioal debut in 2020. She was selected in the Belgian squad for the 2022 Women's FIH Hockey World Cup, held in July 2022. ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian field hockey players Category:Sportswomen
title: Hélène Brasseur
